# ParseError class

Thrown by [parse()](./parser.parse.md) on error

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ParseError extends Error 
```
**Extends:** Error

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ParseError` class.
